original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Paṇāmitavagga
analyzed: paṇāmita vagga

original: 4. Pharusavācābhāvapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ therena sāriputtena dhammasenāpatinā parisuddhavacīsamācāro
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā parisuddha vacī samācāraḥ

original: āvuso tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritaṁ, yaṁ tathāgato rakkheyya ‘mā
analyzed: āvuso tathāgataḥ natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccarita yam tathāgataḥ rakkheyya mā

original: me idaṁ paro aññāsī’ti.
analyzed: me idam paras aññāsi iti

original: Puna ca tathāgato therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparādhe pārājikaṁ paññapento
analyzed: puna ca tathāgataḥ therassa sudinnassa kalanda puttassa aparādhe pārājikam paññapentaḥ

original: pharusāhi vācāhi moghapurisavādena samudācari, tena ca so thero moghapurisavādena
analyzed: pharusāhi mogha purisa vādena samudācari tena ca saḥ theraḥ mogha purisa vādena

original: maṅkucittavasena rundhitattā vippaṭisārī nāsakkhi ariyamaggaṁ paṭivijjhituṁ.
analyzed: maṅku citta vasena vippaṭisārī na asakkhi ariya maggam paṭivijjhitu

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, parisuddhavacīsamācāro tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritaṁ,
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena parisuddha vacī samācāraḥ tathāgataḥ na atthi tathāgatassa vacī duccarita

original: tena hi tathāgatena therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparādhe moghapurisavādena
analyzed: tena hi tathāgatena therassa sudinnassa kalanda puttassa aparādhe mogha purisa vādena

original: samudāciṇṇanti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: samudāciṇṇanti yam tam micchā

original: Yadi bhagavatā therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparādhe moghapurisavādena samudāciṇṇaṁ,
analyzed: yadi bhagavatā therassa sudinnassa kalanda puttassa aparādhe mogha purisa vādena

original: tena hi parisuddhavacīsamācāro tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritanti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: tena hi parisuddha vacī samācāraḥ tathāgataḥ natthi tathāgatassa vacī duccaritan ti tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, therena sāriputtena dhammasenāpatinā—
analyzed: mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā

original: ‘parisuddhavacīsamācāro āvuso tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritaṁ, yaṁ tathāgato rakkheyya “mā me idaṁ paro aññāsī”’ti.
analyzed: parisuddha vacī samācāraḥ āvuso tathāgataḥ natthi tathāgatassa vacī duccarita yam tathāgataḥ rakkheyya mā me idam paraḥ aññāsi iti

original: Āyasmato ca sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparādhe pārājikaṁ paññapentena bhagavatā moghapurisavādena samudāciṇṇaṁ, tañca pana aduṭṭhacittena asārambhena yāthāvalakkhaṇena.
analyzed: āyasmataḥ ca sudinnassa kalanda puttassa aparādhe pārājikam paññapentena bhagavatā moghapurisa vādena tat ca pana aduṭṭha cittena asārambhena yāthāva lakkhaṇena

original: Kiñca tattha yāthāvalakkhaṇaṁ, yassa, mahārāja, puggalassa imasmiṁ attabhāve catusaccābhisamayo
analyzed: kiñca tattha yāthāva lakkhaṇa yassa mahā rāja puggalassa imasmin atta bhāve catu sacca abhisamayaḥ

original: na hoti, tassa purisattanaṁ moghaṁ aññaṁ kayiramānaṁ aññena sambhavati, tena vuccati ‘moghapuriso’ti.
analyzed: na hoti tassa purisattanam mogham aññam kayiramānam aññena sambhavati tena vuccati mogha purisaḥ ti

original: Iti, mahārāja, bhagavatā āyasmato sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sabhāvavacanena samudāciṇṇaṁ, no abhūtavādenā”ti.
analyzed: iti mahā rāja bhagavatā āyasmataḥ sudinnassa kalanda puttassa sabhāva vacanena no abhūta vādena ati

original: “Sabhāvampi, bhante nāgasena, yo akkosanto bhaṇati, tassa mayaṁ kahāpaṇaṁ daṇḍaṁ dhārema, aparādhoyeva so vatthuṁ nissāya visuṁ vohāraṁ ācaranto akkosatī”ti.
analyzed: sabhāvam pi bhante nāgasena yaḥ akkosantaḥ bhaṇati tassa mayam kahāpaṇam daṇḍam dhārema aparādhaḥ yā iva saḥ vatthum nissāya visum vohāram ācarantaḥ akkosati iti

original: “Atthi pana, mahārāja, sutapubbaṁ tayā khalitassa abhivādanaṁ vā paccuṭṭhānaṁ vā sakkāraṁ vā upāyanānuppadānaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: atthi pana mahā rāja suta pubbam tayā khalitassa abhivādanam vā paccuṭṭhānam vā sakkāram vā upāyana anuppadānam vā ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, yato kutoci yattha katthaci khalito, so paribhāsanāraho hoti tajjanāraho, uttamaṅgampissa chindanti hanantipi bandhantipi ghātentipi jhāpentipī”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante yatas kutoci yattha katthaci khalito so paribhāsana ārahaḥ hoti tajjana ārahaḥ uttama aṅgam pi ssa chindanti hananti pi bandhanti pi ghātenti pi jhāpenti pi iti

original: “Tena hi, mahārāja, bhagavatā kiriyāyeva katā, no akiriyā”ti.
analyzed: tena hi mahā rāja bhagavatā kiriyāyā iva katā no a kiriyā ati

original: “Kiriyampi, bhante nāgasena, kurumānena patirūpena kātabbaṁ anucchavikena, savanenapi,
analyzed: kiriyam pi bhante nāgasena kuru mānena pati rūpena kātabbam anucchavikena savanena api

original: bhante nāgasena, tathāgatassa sadevako loko ottappati hiriyati bhiyyo dassanena tatuttariṁ
analyzed: bhante nāgasena tathāgatassa sa devakaḥ lokaḥ ottappati hiriyati bhiyyas dassanena tatuttari

original: upasaṅkamanena payirupāsanenā”ti.
analyzed: upasaṅkamanena payiḥ upāsanena ati

original: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, tikicchako abhisanne kāye kupite dose sinehanīyāni bhesajjāni detī”ti?
analyzed: api nu khalu mahā rāja tikicchakaḥ abhisanne kāye kupite dose sinehanīyāni bhesajjāni deti iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, tiṇhāni lekhanīyāni bhesajjāni detī”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante tiṇhāni lekhanīyāni bhesajjāni deti iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato sabbakilesabyādhivūpasamāya anusiṭṭhiṁ deti, pharusāpi, mahārāja, tathāgatassa vācā satte sinehayati, muduke karoti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ sabba kilesa byādhi vūpasamāya anusiṭṭhim deti pharusā api mahā rāja tathāgatassa vācā satte sinehayati muduke karoti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, uṇhampi udakaṁ yaṁ kiñci sinehanīyaṁ sinehayati, mudukaṁ karoti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja uṇham pi udakam yam kiñci sinehanīyam sinehayati mudukam karoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, pharusāpi tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī hoti karuṇāsahagatā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja pharusā api tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī hoti karuṇā sahagatā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, pituvacanaṁ puttānaṁ atthavantaṁ hoti karuṇāsahagataṁ;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja pitu vacanam puttānam atthavantam hoti karuṇā sahagata

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, pharusāpi tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī hoti karuṇāsahagatā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja pharusā api tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī hoti karuṇā sahagatā

original: Pharusāpi, mahārāja, tathāgatassa vācā sattānaṁ kilesappahānā hoti.
analyzed: pharusā api mahā rāja tathāgatassa vācā sattānam kilesa ppahānā hoti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, duggandhampi gomuttaṁ pītaṁ virasampi agadaṁ khāyitaṁ sattānaṁ byādhiṁ hanati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja duggandham pi gomuttam pītam virasam pi agadam khāyitam sattānam byādhim hanati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, pharusāpi tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī karuṇāsahagatā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja pharusā api tathāgatassa vācā atthavatī karuṇā sahagatā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahantopi tūlapuñjo parassa kāye nipatitvā rujaṁ na karoti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahantaḥ api tūla puñjaḥ parassa kāye nipatitvā rujam na karoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, pharusāpi tathāgatassa vācā na kassaci dukkhaṁ uppādetī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja pharusā api tathāgatassa vācā na kassaci dukkham uppādeti iti

original: “Suvinicchito, bhante nāgasena, pañho bahūhi kāraṇehi.
analyzed: su vinicchitaḥ bhante nāgasena pañhaḥ bahūhi kāraṇehi

original: Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Pharusavācābhāvapañho catuttho.
analyzed: pharusa vācā abhāva pañho catuttho
